trans-unit.source: Enacting configurations
trans-unit.target: 施行設定

trans-unit.source: Applies To: Windows PowerShell 4.0, Windows PowerShell 5.0
trans-unit.target: 適用於：Windows PowerShell 4.0、Windows PowerShell 5.0

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to enact PowerShell Desired State Configuration (DSC) configurations: push mode and pull mode.
trans-unit.target: PowerShell 預期狀態設定 (DSC) 設定有兩種施行方式：Push 模式和 Pull 模式。

trans-unit.source: Push mode
trans-unit.target: Push 模式

trans-unit.source: ![Push mode](images/Push.png "How push mode works")
trans-unit.target: ![Push 模式](images/Push.png "How push mode works")

trans-unit.source: Push mode refers to a user actively applying a configuration to a target node by calling the [Start-DscConfiguration](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dn521623.aspx) cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: Push 模式指的是使用者呼叫 [Start-DscConfiguration](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dn521623.aspx) Cmdlet，將設定積極套用至目標節點。

trans-unit.source: After creating and compiling a configuration, you can enact it in push mode by calling the [Start-DscConfiguration](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dn521623.aspx) cmdlet, setting the -Path parameter of the cmdlet to the path where the configuration MOF is located.
trans-unit.target: 建立及編譯設定後，您可以呼叫 [Start-DscConfiguration](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dn521623.aspx) Cmdlet，設定 MOF 所在路徑之 Cmdlet 的 -Path 參數，以 Push 模式施行設定。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the configuration MOF is locted at `C:\DSC\Configurations\localhost.mof`, you would apply it to the local machine with the following command: `Start-DscConfiguration -Path 'C:\DSC\Configurations'`
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果設定 MOF 位於 `C:\DSC\Configurations\localhost.mof`，您可以使用下列命令將它套用到本機電腦： `Start-DscConfiguration -Path 'C:\DSC\Configurations'`

trans-unit.source: __Note__: By default, DSC runs a configuration as a background job.
trans-unit.target: __注意__：DSC 預設將設定當做背景工作執行。

trans-unit.source: To run the configuration interactively, call the [Start-DscConfiguration](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dn521623.aspx) with the __-Wait__ parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要以互動方式執行設定，請呼叫 [Start-DscConfiguration](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dn521623.aspx) 配以 __-Wait__ 參數。

trans-unit.source: Cloud deployment engines typically leverage Pull Mode inside of a broader deployment solution.
trans-unit.target: 在更大的部署解決方案內，雲端部署引擎通常會利用 Pull 模式。

trans-unit.source: For example, Microsoft Azure provides a [DSC Extension](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/articles/virtual-machines-extensions-features/) for virtual machines.
trans-unit.target: 例如，Microsoft Azure 為虛擬機器提供 [DSC 擴充功能](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/articles/virtual-machines-extensions-features/)。

trans-unit.source: This provides an option to include a configuration script and all required DSC modules in an archive file that is extracted and executed within a virtual machine as part of a deployment.
trans-unit.target: 這提供您在封存檔案中包含設定指令碼和所有必要 DSC 模組的選項，在虛擬機器內，這個封存檔案是當做部署的一部分來執行和擷取。

trans-unit.source: Pull mode
trans-unit.target: Pull 模式

trans-unit.source: ![Pull Mode](images/Pull.png "How pull mode works") In pull mode, pull clients are configured to get their desired state configurations from a remote pull server.
trans-unit.target: ![Pull 模式](images/Pull.png "How pull mode works") 在 Pull 模式中，提取用戶端會設定成從遠端的提取伺服器取得其所需的狀態設定。

trans-unit.source: Likewise, the pull server has been set up to host the DSC service, and has been provisioned with the configurations and resources that are required by the pull clients.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，提取伺服器已設為 DSC 服務主機，佈建了提取用戶端所需要的設定和資源。

trans-unit.source: Each one of the pull clients has a scheduled task that performs a periodic compliance check on the configuration of the node.
trans-unit.target: 每個提取用戶端都有排定的工作，對節點設定執行定期的相容性檢查。

trans-unit.source: When the event is triggered the first time, it causes the Local Configuration Manager (LCM) on the pull client to validate the configuration.
trans-unit.target: 事件第一次觸發時，會讓提取用戶端的本機設定管理員 (LCM) 驗證設定。

trans-unit.source: If the pull client is configured as desired, nothing happens.
trans-unit.target: 如果提取用戶端設定為所需，就不會發生任何事。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the LCM makes a request to the pull server to get a given configuration.
trans-unit.target: 否則，LCM 就會要求提取伺服器取得指定的設定。

trans-unit.source: If that configuration exists on the pull server, and it passes initial validation checks, the configuration is transmitted to the pull client, where it is then executed by the LCM.
trans-unit.target: 如果提取伺服器上有這個設定，而且它通過了初始驗證檢查，設定就會傳輸到提取用戶端，LCM 會在這裡執行它。

trans-unit.source: For more information on deploying a DSC Pull Server on premises, see the DSC Pull Server Configuration and Planning Guide.
trans-unit.target: 如需部署內部部署 DSC 提取伺服器的詳細資訊，請參閱＜DSC 提取伺服器設定和規劃指南＞。

trans-unit.source: If you would prefer to take advantage of an online service to host Pull Server functionality, see the [Azure Automation DSC](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/articles/automation-dsc-overview/) service.
trans-unit.target: 如果想要利用線上服務裝載提取伺服器功能，請參閱 [Azure 自動化 DSC](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/articles/automation-dsc-overview/) 服務。
